questions.questiontext: Which is the correct procedure when setting off?
What might cause the car to stall when setting off?
questions.answertext: Bringing the clutch up too quickly is one reason the car may stall when setting off.

questions.questiontext: Can you move away when there is oncoming traffic?
questions.answertext: You can move away when there is oncoming traffic if it is safe to. Be careful where road positions are compromised by parked cars.

choices.text: Only if oncoming vehicles are yellow

questions.questiontext: When should you apply the signal when setting off?
questions.answertext: Only apply the signal once it's safe to pull away. Applying the signal too early is unnerving for passing traffic and can be confusing.

choices.text: As you're waiting for a space
When it's safe to pull away

questions.questiontext: Which procedure should you use when pulling over?
Which is it ok to park at?
questions.answertext: It's ok to park alongside a lamp post but be careful of your position where you will need to open doors.

questions.questiontext: When should you signal to pull over?
questions.answertext: Signal to pull over if there is anybody to benefit. This could be other road users or pedestrians.

choices.text: If there is anybody to benefit

questions.questiontext: Once stopped to park, what must you do before releasing the foot pedals?
questions.answertext: Apply the handbrake and select neutral before releasing the foot pedals otherwise the car will stall and possibly roll.

questions.questiontext: When pulling over, what must your signal not be?
questions.answertext: The signal to pull over must not be misleading. Make sure you have passed any prior side roads before applying it.

questions.questiontext: At which point should you completely depress the clutch when pulling over?
questions.answertext: Completely depress the clutch just before the vehicle stops. Pressing it too early results in 'coasting' which reduces the effectiveness of the brakes. On poor road surfaces, the increased brake pressure required could cause the vehicle to skid.
